  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.ConnectionServerRMI

      class ConnectionServerRMI extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • lobbyGameListController
          LobbyGameListsController lobbyGameListController
          The controller in the server that handle the creation, joining and leaving of lobby and games
        • logger
          ServerLogger logger
          The logger used to log the connection with the client if it fails
        • serverExecutor
          ExecutorService serverExecutor
          The executor service that will handle the connection with the client

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI.VirtualControllerRMI

      class VirtualControllerRMI extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controllerCommandsExecutor
          ExecutorService controllerCommandsExecutor
          The executor that actually runs the communication to the server
        • controllerExecutor
          ThreadPoolExecutor controllerExecutor
          The executor that manages the sending of controller commands. It delegates his work to the controllerExecutor
        • controllerStub
          ControllerInterface controllerStub
          The stub of the controller interface. It contains all the method that can be call on the sever
        • heartBeatExecutor
          ScheduledExecutorService heartBeatExecutor
          The executor that manages the ping pong from the client to the server
        • heartBeatFuture
          Future<?> heartBeatFuture
          The future of the heartBeat. It is used to check if the connection is still alive every pingPongPeriod second
        • heartBeatStub
          HeartBeatInterface heartBeatStub
          The stub of the heartBeat interface. It contains the method call on the server to check if the connection is still alive
        • view
          ViewInterface view
          The view of the client

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI.VirtualViewRMI

      class VirtualViewRMI extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • alreadyDisconnected
          boolean alreadyDisconnected
          A flag that indicates if the client has already disconnected for avoid reboot
        • controller
          ControllerInterface controller
          The controller of the game
        • heartBeatExecutor
          ScheduledExecutorService heartBeatExecutor
          The executor that manages the heartBeat mechanism
        • heartBeatFuture
          Future<?> heartBeatFuture
          The future of the heartBeat. It is used to check if the connection is still alive every pingPongPeriod second
        • heartBeatStub
          HeartBeatInterface heartBeatStub
          The stub of the heartBeat interface. It contains the method call on the client to check if the connection is still alive
        • viewStub
          ViewInterface viewStub
          The stub of the view on the client
        • viewUpdateExecutor
          ExecutorService viewUpdateExecutor
          The executor that actually manage the sending of client commands
        • virtualViewExecutor
          ThreadPoolExecutor virtualViewExecutor
          The executor that manages the sending of client commands. It delegates his work to the virtualViewExecutor

          List<Observer> observers
          The list of observers of the class

        • secretObjectiveOptions
          LightCard[] secretObjectiveOptions
          The secretObjective options that the player has received from the server. If the player has not received any secretObjective options or has already chosen one, each element of the array is null

      • Serialized Fields

          LightCard[] publicObjective
          The public objectives of the game. Each element of this array is null until the publicObjective are drawn
        • winners
          List<String> winners
          The list of winners of the game. This list is empty until the game ends
